# List more advanced user options

| Field                        | Description                                                                                           | Required | Default                | Example      |
|------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------|------------------------|--------------|
| **[global]**                 |                                                                                                       |          |                        |              |
| gdal_cache                   | Set the GDAL cache in megabytes to restrict the footprint of GDAL                                     | No       | `need help to fill in` | 10           |
| keep_temp_files              | True/False                                                                                            | No       |                        | False        |
| thread                       | Set the number of threads of the calculations                                                         | No       |                        | 4            |
| **[hazard.settings]**        |                                                                                                       |          |                        |              |
| chunk                        | Divide grid into smaller chunks. Define grid chunk size (Advise to use the setting under global.grid) | No       |                        | [1024, 1014] |
| **[exposure.grid.settings]** |                                                                                                       |          |                        |              |
| chunk                        | Divide grid into smaller chunks. Define grid chunk size (Advise to use the setting under global.grid) | No       |                        | [1024, 1014] |
| **[vulnerability]**          |                                                                                                       |          |                        |              |
| step_size                    | Interpolation scale for the hazard magnitude to create the vulnerability curves                       | No       |                        | 0.1          |
